div.p: Extended eLearning days include the following dates: April 7th-April 9th, April 14th-April 16th, April 21st-April 23rd, April 28th-April 30th, May 5th-May 7th, and May 12th-May 14th. Mondays and Fridays during these weeks will be teacher preparation days and will be non-academic for students.
